alert.note: Alert for Johnson County, Casper BLM; Natrona County, Casper BLM (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued July 20 at 1:13PM MDT until July 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Friday afternoon through Friday evening. * IMPACTS: Low humidity...above normal temperatures...and gusty west to northwest wind will create erratic fire behavior and new fire starts. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zone....280. In North Central WY Fire Zone....281. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Natrona. In North Central WY...Johnson. * WIND: West to Northwest 12 to 20 mph with gusts around 30 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 12 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the lower to mid 90s.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
